MyABC MyABC
Start Lesson About //Nada: add about_label Close Choose a Letter!


 Welcome to MyABC application
MyABC is an Android mobile application that supports fun alphabets learning to children. 

 It provides letters of the alphabet (A through Z) along with photos, sounds, and words. 

 It provides an attractive song video that facilitates the learning for children. 

 The simple interface helps children focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the lesson.
